segments.text: That'll be 12 dollars and 95 cents , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you break a 100 dollar bill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you don't have anything smaller ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm sorry . That's all I have . Unless you take a credit card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sure . Credit card is fine .
segments.speaker: S1
